PARAGRAPH.STRING: is a massive volcanic cone of great beauty, surmounting the projection of the coast between Wood Bay and Terra Nova Bay, in Victoria Land of Antarctica.
Discovered in 1841 by James Clark Ross, who named
for Lord Melbourne, British Prime Minister when the expedition was being planned.
is undissected by glaciation. Many young cones dot the flanks and
may have erupted as recently as during the 18-19th Century. Fumarolic activity is found on the southern rim of the summit crater and along a NNE-SSW line cutting through the summit region.
